#summary How you can contribute to Abot.
#labels Featured

=Contribute=
Here are few things that the Abot project could use...
  * Spread the word on blogs/websites and tell others why Abot is great
  * Report bugs or suggest features here http://code.google.com/p/abot/issues
  * Let us know when you create a cool project that uses Abot
  * Submit bug fixes or features (contact me if your interested or comment on this page)

==Consider Making A Donation==
Many hours are spent developing Abot outside of regular working hours. Any donation would be greatly appreciated. If you have more time than money consider visiting the [Contribute Contribute] page.<br />
[https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G6ZY6BZNBFVQJ https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif]

Please reach out if you have other contribution ideas by emailing abotcrawler@gmail.com.
